She carries you across her studio apartment and puts you back down on the middle of her dining table. Right when you're starting to wonder what she plans to do with you, you're suddenly surrounded by darkness. A quick walk around your small, circular prison and a few taps on the ceramic walls reveal that she's put a mug upside down on top of you. You hear muffled noises coming from outside that you think sound maybe like Lindsay leaving her apartment, but you're not sure. In any event, soon there's silence. You try moving the mug, but it's just too heavy, so you give up and go to sleep.

You wake up a few hours later to a lot of bustle and noise from outside. You're just starting to wonder if you're hearing multiple voices when the mug is lifted off. You struggle to adjust to the light as you hear nothing but loud, high-pitched squeals. Once you can see, you see before you the nightmare scenario: a gaggle of giddy young women, all staring directly at you with surprised, gleeful expressions on their faces. You can tell right away that they've all had a few drinks. What time is it?

"See, I told you he was real," says Lindsay to the others. "Now it's time for the fun."

She looks down on you. "Here's how this is going to work. I'm going to let my friends tell you about themselves, and then you're going to pick who you want to own you."

"Own me? But what's my say in all this?" you ask, which prompts a round of raucous laughter from the women. You decide not to continue to protest.

"That's great," says the girl to Lindsay's left, a short, fit girl with short, dark hair. "Why don't I go first. I'm Jacqui," she says, doing a mock curtsy for you. "I'm ... well, let me just tell you what we'll do together. I'm going to put massage oil all over my body, and you can run up and down, just like a slip-n-slide. And I'll make sure you get to go ... everywhere."

Hey, that doesn't sound half bad. The next girl starts.

"Hey, I'm Sandra," she says. She's tall with a strong build, but she still seems very feminine. "I could lie to you, but I'll tell you the truth, I don't want to be your friend. I'm going to throw you in the toilet, and I'm going to go right on top of your head. But I won't flush you ... maybe."

"Yeah, that sounds like fun, even though you'd only have him for about ten minutes," says the third, a tall, skinny girl with long blonde hair. "See, I think it'd be more fun to just throw him in a pot of water and start boiling it. See how long he makes it until he screams." She looks down at you. "How does that sound for a fun date night, cutie?"

This is getting a little horrific. Do you really get to choose, or is this all just a trap? You turn to the last girl, a short, sweet-looking girl with reddish-brown hair and a sweet smile. "Hi," she says. "I'm Mary Ellen. I think we could have a lot of fun together. I'd even shove you up my pussy..." You smile, relieved. "... during my period." Your smile disappears.

Well, they're all staring at you expectantly. Looks like they're waiting on you to choose one of them.
11523.title: She shows you off to her friends

Yourself
You know what, screw this, go enlarge a pizza
12.content:
You run into the office, find the gun, and run the hell out of there without incident. A couple of other employees give you funny looks as you run like hell, but soon none of that will matter.

As soon as Dr. Marks started telling you about this amazing gun, you had one thought: giants. Ever since you were little you've been fascinated by giants, and the thought of what it would actually be like if there was a giant walking down the street in real life, tearing stuff up and doing whatever it felt like.

Now you finally have the chance to make that dream a reality. Sure, it's probably dangerous, but who cares? This is the one chance you've got. Turning the switch to "grow," you look around and wonder what kind of giant you want to see. You've always wanted to see what a real-life giantess would actually be like, so you could find a random good-looking girl, and enlarge her to massive proportions before she knew what hit her. Of course, if you wanted mayhem, maybe you should enlarge a whole group of people and see all the different things they decide to do.

But you also have a female friend or two who you think wouldn't mind becoming a giantess, and that way you could ride on her shoulder or in her ear and make some suggestions on what she should do. That would be a lot of fun. Finally, there's always the idea of becoming a giant yourself. You wouldn't mind wreaking havoc for a little while.

So what will you do?
12.title: Who should become a giant?

choices: You feel bad for her: shrink her back down to normal
Go outside and see what you can do
Keep watching and see what happens
121.content:
For years now you've longed to see a giantess in real life, and now that you finally have the opportunity, you almost can't even decide how you want to do it. You decide to take the train back to campus, since it's getting dark out and you want to see what a giantess is like during the day. Also, a college campus is probably a better location since the giantess will have more room to spread out without destroying things. So you go home and get a good night's sleep.

The next morning you wake up with thoughts of a giant college student already on your mind. You look out your window and notice a perfect situation right in front of you: a very pretty girl, clearly a student but not someone you recognize, sitting on a bench reading a book. She's wearing a tight blouse, a medium-size skirt, and sandals. To make it even better, lots of students are currently walking to and fro, completely unaware that they're soon to flee in fear. You open the window, lean out with the gun, point and fire.

It's a direct hit, and you're in the mood for a real giantess. This girl, thrown completely off guard, drops her book almost immediately but doesn't stop growing until she's a couple of hundred feet tall. She is in obvious total shock and terrified, since she has absolutely no idea what happened to her but a very clear realization that she will be the center of attention for miles around for the foreseeable future. She also sees the crowd of students immediately running from her for their lives, despite every girl's hopes not to be completely repulsive.

You, of course, find this totally fascinating. The girl immediately moves her legs together so no one can see up her skirt, and she carefully moves out into the open field between two buildings to make sure she doesn't step on someone. There's actually a bit of drama as some of the fleeing students didn't know where to go and wound up running right where the giantess was going. But her terror has made her all the more careful, and she successfully holds her foot up every time until someone gets out of her way. "I'M NOT TRYING TO HURT YOU," she says, with desperation in her voice. "I DON'T EVEN KNOW WHAT HAPPENED, I SWEAR."

The crowd reaction, though, is the best part. From your bedroom vantage point, you see your schoolmates running in every direction, trying to avoid the sudden giantess in their midst. Within a few minutes, everyone has escaped and the giant coed seems to be the only person outside, though you can see countless students far off in the distance, glancing around the corners of buildings, fascinated by what they see but ready to run for their lives should the giantess notice them and come after them.

The giantess doesn't, actually: she mostly just stands around. That's good enough for you, because even from your dorm room window you can still look up and up and up as this girl continues into the sky. You can marvel at the size of her shoes, her perfectly toned legs, and ... well, that's about all you can see from here. She does have a nice skirt.

Fortunately for you, once the giantess is in the middle of the field, she sits down and holds her knees to her chest. She's so scared that she's actually shaking. But for a while, nothing actually happens, she just sits there looking around, not knowing what to do. After a few minutes you think she might be ready to start taking account of things, but you can tell from the way she keeps turning her head around that she has no idea what she can even do. Besides, that's when the cameras show up.

Although your fellow students fled in terror, the TV stations seem to have no problem going right up to her and filming her: her expression, the size of her body, and angles that you wouldn't believe they had the audacity to shoot. You're not the only one who notices.

"PLEASE, PLEASE DON'T DO THAT," she says. "PLEASE HELP ME, I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT'S GOING ON." The cameramen - and they're all men - act as if she hasn't said anything. As they keep shooting, you see the giantess become even more uncomfortable. At one point she even reaches the back of her hand out to a cameraman, but she only wants to guide him away. He very quickly gets the picture, and he backs up to a respectful distance without coming close to being touched. But the cameras keep encroaching, and as you look out over to the parking lot, more seem to be coming.

You wonder if she's going to be able to maintain her composure for long. This is pretty bad. When will the police show up?
121.title: The Sudden Giantess

choices: No one
The girl
Everyone
1211.content:
All right, all right: this was fun, but this girl clearly has no idea what to do with herself now that she's hundreds of feet tall. She's panicking, she's crying, and she didn't really do anything to deserve this. You've had your fun, and turning her back is easy. You set the gun to "shrink," point it at the giantess standing out outside your dorm, and shoot. She's certainly easy to aim at. Within seconds the whole thing's back to normal.

Except you realize one thing as you pull your gun away. Sure, you're still in your dorm room shrinking the giantess from your window, but it's not like no one could see the beam striking her. The natural instinct is to see where it's coming from, and from there it's pretty simple for everyone to figure out that you're behind the morning's events. Smooth.

You look down to see who noticed that you were shooting the gun.
1211.title: Back to normal... right?

choices: Ask her if you two can go somewhere to talk
Tell her to start giving orders to these people below
Tell her the truth about the gun and see how she reacts
1212.content:
All right, you figure you might as well get involved. You could use the gun to do whatever you want, but you figure you'll take this one slower and see how it goes. By the time you get downstairs and get out there, there are even more TV crews surrounding the increasingly terrified giantess, and there's a crowd of people far off, even more scared to approach. You figure you'll stand out by moving forward confidently.

So that's what you do: you stride towards the cameramen surrounding her like flies, and you shoo them away. "HEY!" Some of them actually start, as if they weren't expecting anyone behind them. "SHE'S A REAL PERSON, TREAT HER LIKE ONE!" you shout. "ASK HER PERMISSION BEFORE YOU PULL STUNTS LIKE THIS!" You pick out one of these jerks and start walking up to him as if you're going to hit him. Right as you raise your fist, he backs away. You turn around, and the rest of the TV guys do the same.

You look up towards the giantess, and she's looking down on you with a big smile on her face. Nothing to win a girl over like defending her honor. All of a sudden, to your right you see a titanic palm outstretched before you, clearly waiting to pick you up. With a shrug, you hop aboard, sit down, and feel the rush of air as she lifts you up to her face. She pulls you in towards her mouth and you feel her soft lips wrapped over you, but just for a second, with a quick kiss. She giggles, and moves you over to her ear. You step off, timidly, not eager to fall off. Once you sit down you exhale and start to relax. "Hey," you say. "You're doing great."

"THANKS," she says back. "IT'S NOT EASY."

The time is right for you to make a suggestion. She clearly doesn't know what to do herself.



It looks like you've literally got her ear. Then you notice you can see down her blouse. Nice!

You spot a farm field surrounded by trees very close to where you two are, you ask her if she would mind going over there for a little more privacy, she agrees seeing as how shes currently everyone's center of attention. The news crews agree to let her have her space for now and she beings walking slowly over to the field. 1213.content:
Ding! The microwave goes off, and 30 seconds later you're back from the kitchen with a fresh batch of popcorn. You lean out the window, transformation gun by your side, ready to watch the show as this terrified and scorching hot coed giantess does her level best to fend off TV reporters with no sense of personal space without violating any rules created for people about a twentieth of her size.

And she's doing a good job of it, at least at first. She eventually realizes if she starts moving around, the cameramen, whose survival instinct is the only thing stronger than their lust for a story, will back off without much of a fight. It's not so easy to do this in a skirt without giving them an even better story than they expected, but she's managing to wave her arms around enough to keep them from crawling all over her, even if she does feel a bit stupid doing it. She is still trying to use reason and common sense, but a booming "PLEASE STOP FILMING ME" seems not to tug at their heartstrings.

Fortunately, a crowd's gathering round, and that's when things start to heat up. A group of this girl's friends, about five in number, come out of the woodwork to start defending her. Within seconds, they're scurrying around her feet and beneath her knees, running around her back and going every which way to keep the media off their giantess friend. At first it doesn't really work, but some more of the crowd awakens their inner activist, and soon the cameramen no longer have the advantage. Of course, the giantess could stomp out anyone she wanted to, but she doesn't seem the type.

Soon enough, there's an equilibrium around the giantess, still sitting in the field by your dorm with her arms wrapped around her knees. She's still more terrified than anything, but her friends down below are willing to stand up for her. The cameramen are backing off, but more cars are arriving every minute. This situation is going to blow up very soon.
1213.title: The Gathering Storm

choices: Enlarge some more people
Make one of the girls much bigger than the other two
Go back inside and hide
122.content:
You leave the office and walk over to the train station, wondering what it'd be like to have a bunch of giant people roaming the city and wreaking havoc. Of course, you don't want to enlarge just anyone, so you hold off on firing the gun for a few minutes. Outside the station, though, you see a revelation: three teenage girls, probably about 16 or 17, who look like the perfect target. They're all very pretty with nice figures, one of them is wearing a skirt, and they look naive and bitchy enough that they won't just stand around when they become giantesses. Conceivably you could think about this some more, but why? You turn the gun to "grow" and fire it at the three of them.

You probably should have thought it through. First off, these girls weren't very far away from you to begin with, and you completely forgot to factor in the abject panic that would start almost immediately. As a result, you wind up having no idea what's going on, as people run frantically in every direction and there are six titanic feet moving around you. You had hoped to make the girls around the same size as the buildings nearby, which were about 20-30 stories apiece, but you don't even have time to check. Fearing for your own safety, you follow a crowd into a nearby building, where everyone rushes to the basement. You wind up not seeing any of what happens at all.

-----------------------

The girls, on the other hand, can see pretty much everything. Initially completely thrown off by their change in size and the sheer expanse of city and suburb spreading out before then, they adjust quickly as wry smiles start coming over their faces. The tall blonde one, named Angela, looked over one of the taller buildings. She glanced back at her two friends - well, they were technically friends but they mostly just went to school together and she really couldn't wait to get out of there - and noticed that all three of them were about as tall as the buildings around them. Angela wondered if she could physically wreck a building. This was pretty neat.

Emily, with a model's physique and light brown hair, walked over to the fleeing crowd. "WAIT, HOLD ON," she said in a voice that boomed down to the ground below. "YOU DON'T HAVE TO BE SCARED. WE'RE NOT EVIL OR ANYTHING." The crowd did not seem to take her seriously, but more than a few men in the crowd got at least temporarily distracted

"HEY GUYS, WHAT ARE YOU DOING," said Zoe, the short one, as she called out to her friends. "ARE YOU EVEN PAYING ATTENTION TO WHAT YOU'RE STEPPING ON?" They ignored her, as they always did. (Angela stopped to give her a dirty look, but that was about it.) Still, Zoe could tell from the footprints of smashed up cars, dents in the road and small red splotches that her two friends had been pretty careless. But if they can go around stepping on people, why couldn't she?

Angela had actually long since stopped paying attention to the ground below her. She had already noticed that she could press on a building and cause it to just collapse under her fingertips. She then formed a fist and brought it down on the roof; to her delight she bashed through about three floors. She then tried kicking, then a series of punches like it was a punching bag. Angela wasn't a particularly bitter girl, but you couldn't tell by the rage with which she tore at that building. It was 36 stories when she started, and it only took two minutes for Angela to smash it up to the point where the building just collapsed upon herself. Angela then looked at the pile of rubble and smiled. It never occurred to her that there were real people inside.

Emily somehow failed to notice Angela's shenanigans, being too fascinated with the fleeing crowd of people she had long since caught up with. She tried telling them a couple of times that she didn't mean anything bad, and she really didn't, but the crowd continued running away from her regardless. Emily, pouting, reached out to the crowd. Picking up a good fifteen or twenty people in her palm, she walked to the nearest park about three or four blocks away and laid down on her back. She lifted up her blouse a little and put the people on her stomach. She smiled at them, then laid her head back and looked up at the sky, waiting to see what her little captives decided to do.

Zoe decided she'd try to play around too, but she had limited success. A train had the poor fortune of coming into the station right as the girls became big, and Zoe thought it'd be fun to pick it up from one end and swing it around a little like a rope. The train, however, didn't cooperate, as every time she tried to pick up the front car, it just snapped off from the other ones. It looked like the attachments between the two cars were no match for giantess Zoe. That thought, if it even occurred to her, didn't help much, as she threw aside the offending front car and tried to lift up all the cars at once, over and over. Eventually she had thrown about five or six train cars off into some building, and she was still mad. She stomped all the rest into oblivion.

---------------

Back in the basement, you have no idea what's going on. You hear a lot of horrific stomping, and eventually a loud, awful and unceasing noise from the right that everyone instinctively knows is the sound of the next-door building crumbling. Eventually the noises subside, though, and as they become more faint and distant you realize this may be your one chance to fix things.

Of course, your diabolical nature takes over, and you start to wonder: do you really want to end this? Maybe you just need to shake things up a bit.
122.title: The Girls

choices: He grabs the gun
He knocks the gun into the hand of one of the giantesses
You kick him in the gut and continue growing these chicks
1221.content:
OK, so this is a fun situation with these three hot giantess girls, but you can do better. If three are good, why not a bunch more?

You look around the square to see if you can find anyone else to enlarge. Unlike your Godzilla-movie expectations, the streets are mostly quiet. Apparently once these chicks got so big, everyone ran inside to hide. No sense in being a sitting duck. There are a few dudes out who are clearly into the sight of giantesses (and God bless 'em) but mostly there's not much to see.

You duck back into the building and take a serious look around for the first time. People are huddled around doorways, with terrified looks on their faces as they squint at the flickering lights and hear the loud thumps of the giantesses' footsteps outside. You've got people from all walks of life, young and old, men and women, some in suits and some who look like they spent last night sleeping on the street. Everyone is panicked.

Then you see a group of four hot girls. You've got two blondes, and two brunettes, one of whom is Asian and the other of whom looks vaguely Hispanic. You'd go for any of them in a second. They're turning towards each other and talking excitedly as they try to take in what's going on, so you think they're friends. Perfect.

Not that it really matters, but you sidle in with a group under one of the doorways to try and blend in. You subtly pull the gun out of your pocket and point it at the women. It's still on "grow," so all you have to do is fire.

This is the first time you've enlarged someone inside a building, and you're thrown off guard as they grow within the confines of the building. They grow quickly, too quickly for anyone to have much time to react. They immediately start crouching, but when their heads hit the ceiling, they stretch out and soon they're laying down. People are being knocked over and shoved underneath these rapidly growing masses of flesh.

And in fact, maybe you should have thought of that before you tried this trick indoors. You're holding down the trigger right in the open now, and a giant thigh is rapidly approaching you, not because its owner is moving her giant leg but because it's growing so fast. The space left in your section of the hallway is rapidly dwindling, but one of the few alert bystanders sees that it's you causing this pandemonium. He lunges towards you.
1221.title: Enlarge some more people

choices: They want to join in the fun
These ones turn out to be responsible women with an ounce of sense
12213.content:
The bystander turns out to be a minor nuisance, as a well-timed kick crumples him up on the floor. Good work. You don't even lose stride as you keep the gun firing and the women expanding, but you're starting to worry that maybe you really should have thought this through, as you are rapidly running out of space.

Fortunately, just as you're about to be pressed against the wall by a titanic thigh, you hear a loud crash in the distance, and the woman pulls away. Although you can't see much beyond the giant leg, it's clear that they've pushed through the ceiling, and they now have the size and strength to break through as many floors as you want. Things only get easier as you continue to enlarge these hot chicks, and soon they've pushed through the roof and knocked through most of the exterior walls. All you have to do is make sure none of their feet get too close to you, and soon enough you've got four fresh new giantesses. Perfect. (Pity for anyone on a higher floor in the building though.)

The girls step out from the rubble of the building and look around the square. They appear completely shocked, and they eye the first three giantesses warily. Being as tall as a downtown office building must take some adjustment.
12213.title: No interruption

choices: Shrink down Zoe and Angela next to giantess Emily
Make Emily and Angela a little smaller and Zoe a lot bigger
1222.content:
You leave the building just in time to see the two giantesses Zoe and Angela on either side of you, though of course you still don't know their names for yourself. To you they're just the tall statuesque one and the shorter one. Both seem to have gotten bored with what they were doing at the same time, and they seem to be walking towards the park a few blocks away. On the street level things are deserted, so you have no problem finding a spare bike. You can't keep up with the giantesses in their stride, but you still move fairly quickly and besides, it's not like you can't hear what they say.

The girls walked over to Emily lying on the ground in the park, with a group of people on top of her flat, bare stomach. The girls didn't know what she was up to, and they didn't really care.

"THIS IS BORING," said the giantess Zoe. "ZOE, SHUT UP," replied Emily, not even moving her head. Angela, though, agreed with the first girl: "NO REALLY, EM, WHAT SHOULD WE DO." Emily laid back her head again, either in thought or in exasperation that she had to do something. "I DON'T KNOW, GUYS, MY FRIENDS AND I HERE ARE HAVING A PRETTY GOOD TIME. YOU REALLY CAN'T THINK OF ANYTHING TO DO?"

As the girls continue to talk, you arrive on the scene. It really is an amazing sight to see three giantesses just standing there (well, one lying down) without a care in the world.

You decide it's time to mess things up a bit. They may be friends now, but what happens when only one of them is much bigger than the others? You get ready to shrink down Zoe and Angela, thinking you'll get a big kick out of it when they're both the size of normal people again. Would giantess Emily decides to put them on her stomach too, or would she just ignore them? You wonder if she'd still treat them like equals.

Then you come up with an idea that's even better. Zoe, the shorter, probably slightly younger one is clearly the runt of the group, and it's obvious that neither Angela nor Emily takes her seriously. You wonder how Zoe would start acting if she were a lot bigger and the other two giantesses were, say, half the size. Would that change the group dynamics? That could be fun too.
1222.title: Giantess Dynamics

choices: They kiss, as ordered
They try to run
12222.content:
No point in going halfway, here. You point the gun at Zoe and fire, turning her from roughly 500 feet tall to about three thousand feet tall. Now she's taller than any building in the world, at least three times as big as any building in the city, and about five or six times taller than her two giantess friends. And, to your complete and utter delight, once she's realized what's happened to her, she smiles.

"OH, NOW THIS IS COOL," booms out her voice. You're sure people can hear her from miles away. "HEY, EMILY, GET UP," she says, looking down at her now-diminutive friends.

The smaller giantesses are a bit slower on the uptake. "WHAT?" says Emily, more confused than anything. "WHY?"

"I SAID SO!" shouts Zoe, so loudly that it hurts your ears. She kicks Emily softly, but firmly, in the side of her leg. "NOW."

Emily dutifully stands up, as the people on her stomach slide off and fall to their deaths.

Zoe smiles again, towering over her friends. "NOW KISS."

Now it's Angela's turn to be confused. "WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?" she says. "NOT... EACH OTHER?"

Zoe frowns. "DO IT NOW, OR I WILL STOMP YOU. YOU DO WHAT I SAY NOW."

You're absolutely loving this.
12222.title: Big Zoe

choices: The girls get bombed and killed
The girls fight off the army
The girls surrender
1223.content:
You don't know what you were thinking running outside like that. You could have been killed! Not that you can't be killed this way, too, but at least the building frame should provide some protection. It's like an earthquake, right?

You go inside only a few seconds before the power is knocked out. You already saw where you were going, so you continue and huddle under a doorframe, squeezed in with five or six other people. From there, you sit in the darkness and wait, hearing crashing all around you. Occasionally one of them gets close and you can feel the building shake. You close your eyes and wait for the end, but it never comes.

After about twenty minutes in the darkness, you still have little idea what's going on outside, but you're happy you're still alive. Then you hear the sound of planes whooshing overhead, telling you one thing: the army is here!
1223.title: Go back inside and hide

choices: She's up for it
She has other ideas to try first
123.content:
You decide to make a call on your friend Jenny. You haven't seen her in a while, and you think she might be interested in this gun situation. She's a few years older than you but still a lot of fun to hang out with. The two of you fool around a lot when you're together, but otherwise you're just friends. So there's no strings attached, and as long as she's up for it, you are too.

You call her, telling her there's something she needs to see, and she seems pretty enthusiastic a half hour later when you show up at her apartment. After a bit of initial miscommunication ("There's no way I'm letting a f-ing gun in my house," and so on) you fire the gun at a glass of water she has on the living room table, shrinking it down to an inch tall. Jenny, still animated about having a firearm around, all of a sudden freezes and looks at you in awe.

"That gun can do that?" she asks. "Oh, sure," you reply, "and a whole lot of other things too. That's what I'm here to talk to you about."

She looks at you. "Go on ..."

"Well, this thing doesn't just shrink, of course," you tell her as you enlarge the glass back to its original size. "I thought you and I might have a little bit of fun downtown. You've seen Attack of the 50 Foot Woman, right? What if I turned you into a giantess? You walk down the street, everyone runs in terror, you pick me up and put me on your shoulder, we wreak havoc, everyone has a good time. What do you say?"

Jenny has a weird expression on her face. She looks fascinated, and almost aroused. She then runs at you, jumps you, knocks you down onto her bed and starts ripping her clothes off. You take this as a good sign, but pretty soon you're pretty distracted.

What's Jenny's (eventual) response?
123.title: Jenny

choices: You grab the gun and make it back inside
You're swept up into the crowd
1231.content:
With Jenny on board, you start making plans to create your very own giantess. She's up for pretty much anything you propose, so you suggest an intricate plan.
